statements: UPDATE vehicle_performance_metrics SET engine_temperature = 80.5, fuel_level = 55.7 WHERE vehicle_id = 'f4d01dfb-1ba8-4c40-8a0d-8056b93bfae6';
UPDATE vehicle_performance_metrics SET fuel_level = 63.2, speed = 70 WHERE vehicle_id = '616934d9-75a6-4159-a93d-34d1c0de8c5b';
UPDATE vehicle_performance_metrics SET engine_temperature = 100.5, fuel_level = 45.3 WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE vehicle_performance_metrics SET speed = 60, engine_temperature = 95.2, fuel_level = 50.8 WHERE vehicle_id = 'abcdefg8-7654-1a2b-3456-789abcde1234';
UPDATE VehicleMetrics SET metric_value = 50.5 WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND metric_name = 'Speed';
UPDATE IssueLogs SET reported_by = 'John Doe' WHERE log_id = 456;
UPDATE VehicleMetrics SET metric_value = 10.5, timestamp = '2021-10-01 08:00:00' WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND metric_name = 'Temperature';
UPDATE IssueLogs SET reported_by = 'John Doe', timestamp = '2021-10-02 13:30:00' WHERE vehicle_id = 3 AND log_id = 5;
UPDATE VehicleMetrics SET speed = 60.5, engine_temperature = 80.3 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE FuelConsumption SET fuel_level = 75.2, fuel_consumed = 12.5 WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
UPDATE VehicleMetrics SET speed = 60.5, engine_temperature = 90.2 WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-15 10:00:00';
UPDATE FuelConsumption SET fuel_level = 50.0, fuel_consumed = 10.5 WHERE vehicle_id = 456 AND timestamp < '2022-01-20 08:30:00';
UPDATE VehicleMetrics SET engine_temperature = 80.5, fuel_level = 60.2, speed = 100 WHERE vehicle_id = 1234;
UPDATE EngineStatus SET coolant_temperature = 70.3, oil_pressure = 30.5 WHERE engine_id = 9876;
UPDATE VehicleMetrics SET fuel_level = 30.5, speed = 80 WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
UPDATE EngineStatus SET oil_pressure = 45.2, coolant_temperature = 80.4 WHERE engine_id = 54321;
UPDATE VehicleInfo SET year = 2023 WHERE auto_id = 1;
UPDATE EngineMetrics SET engine_temperature = 80.5, fuel_level = 0.75 WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE VehicleInfo SET manufacturer='Ford', model='Mustang', year=2020 WHERE vehicle_id=101
UPDATE EngineMetrics SET engine_temperature=95.5, fuel_level=60.2, engine_load=70.3 WHERE vehicle_id=203
